mapper.select: select ol.id, ol.watch_id, ol.member_id, ol.price, ol.discount, count, orderday, wt.picture, wt.name FROM `order list` ol LEFT JOIN `watch` wt ON wt.id = ol.watch_id LEFT JOIN `member` mb ON mb.id = ol.member_id WHERE mb.email = #{param1 } and ${param2 } like concat('%',#{param3 },'%') ORDER BY ol.id DESC LIMIT #{param4 }, 10
SELECT wl.id, wt.price, count, wt.name, wl.datetime, wt.picture FROM `wishlist` wl LEFT JOIN `watch` wt ON wt.id = wl.watch_id WHERE email = #{param1 }
